name: Twister Zone - The Revenge (GDD2 - Juiciness)
description:
Mat-Nr.: 01512971

Experience the Twister Zone as never before. Paying hommage to the classic hit by Algida this shoot em up is a modern interpretation of pure juiciness.

VOLUME & SEIZURE WARNING

Juiciness Adjustments:

1. Bullet behavior: Speed increases while traveling
2. Zoom effect when enemy is hit
3. Enemy explosion & sound
4. Bullet trail with smoke & sound
5. Score color & size increases with every kill
6. Every hit enemy will light up the screen
